quests.name: Animal Magnetism
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Ava who lives in Draynor Manor.

quests.name: Another Slice of H.A.M.
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Ambassador Alvijar, who is in Ur-tag's house in Dorgesh-Kaan.

quests.name: The Ascent of Arceuus
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Mori north of the pub in Arceuus.

quests.name: Below Ice Mountain
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Willow on the path south of Ice Mountain.

quests.name: Beneath Cursed Sands
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Jamila in Sophanem

quests.name: Between a Rock...
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to an old dwarf in the Keldagrim mines east of Rellekka and north of the mountain camp, underneath the troll mountains.
notes: You must defeat a level 75 enemy.

quests.name: Big Chompy Bird Hunting
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the ogre Rantz who lives East of the Ogre City, North of the Swamp Pool.

quests.name: Biohazard
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Elena at her home, north east of the Flying Horse Inn in East Ardougne

quests.name: Bone Voyage
quests.description: I can start the quest by speaking to Curator Haig Halen in Varrock Museum.

quests.name: Cabin Fever
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Bill Teach in Port Phasmatys.
notes: Also requires Priest in Peril to get to Port Phasmatys.

quests.name: Client of Kourend
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Veos on the docks of Port Piscarilius.

quests.name: Clock Tower
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Brother Kojo in the Clock Tower south of Ardougne.

quests.name: Cold War
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Larry at the Ardougne Zoo.

quests.name: Contact!
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the High Priest of Icthlarin, who lives in Sophanem.

quests.name: Cook's Assistant
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Cook in the Kitchen on the ground floor of Lumbridge Castle.

quests.name: The Corsair Curse
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to <insert name here> north of Port Sarim
notes: Must be able to defeat a level xx enemy

quests.name: Creature of Fenkenstrain
quests.description: I can start this quest by reading the signpost in the center of Canifis.

quests.name: Darkness of Hallowvale
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Veliaf Hurtz in the Myreque Hideout beneath Burgh de Rott.

quests.name: Death Plateau
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Denulth who is in his tent at the Imperial Guard camp in Burthorpe.

quests.name: Death to the Dorgeshuun
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Mistag in the Dorgeshuun Mines.

quests.name: Demon Slayer
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Gypsy Aris in the tent in Varrock's main square

quests.name: The Depths of Despair
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Lord Kandur Hosidius in his home in south east Hosidius.

quests.name: Desert Treasure
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to The Archaeologist who is exploring the Bedabin Camp South West of the Shantay Pass.

quests.name: Devious Minds
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Monk who is East of Varrock, near the river Salve.

quests.name: The Dig Site
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Examiner at the Digsite Exam Centre

quests.name: Doric's Quest
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Doric who is North of Falador

quests.name: Dragon Slayer I
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Guildmaster in Champions' Guild, south-west of Varrock

quests.name: Dragon Slayer II
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Alec Kincade in the Myths' Guild, west of Corsair Cove.

quests.name: Dream Mentor
quests.description: I can start this quest by inspecting the fallen man, in the mines on the north of Lunar Isle. There should be a tunnel leading to him.
notes: Must have a combat level of 85.

quests.name: Druidic Ritual
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Kaqemeex who is at the Druids Circle just North of Taverley

quests.name: Dwarf Cannon
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Lawgof the Dwarven Captain of the Black Watch. He is defending an area north-west of the Fishing Guild against goblin attack.

quests.name: Eadgar's Ruse
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Sanfew.

quests.name: Eagles' Peak
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Charlie the zookeeper in the Ardougne zoo.

quests.name: Elemental Workshop I
quests.description: I can start this quest by reading a book found in Seers' village.

quests.name: Elemental Workshop II
quests.description: I can start this quest by reading the beaten book found in the education center at The Dig Site.

quests.name: Enakhra's Lament
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to a man called Lazim in the desert south of the Bandit Camp.

quests.name: Enlightened Journey
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Auguste on Entrana.

quests.name: The Eyes of Glouphrie
quests.description: I can start this q  uest by speaking to Brimstail in his cave in the Gnome Stronghold.
notes: Level 13 Runecraft would be an advantage.
Level 45 Woodcutting would be an advantage.

quests.name: Fairytale I - Growing Pains
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Martin the Master Gardener in Draynor Village square.
notes: A high farming level would be an advantage.
You must defeat a level 111 monster.

quests.name: Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Martin the Master Gardener in Draynor Village square.

quests.name: Family Crest
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Dimintheis in East Varrock.

quests.name: The Feud
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Ali Morrisane, a merchant in the Al Kharid bazaar.

quests.name: Fight Arena
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Lady Servil just North-West of the Khazard Port.

quests.name: Fishing Contest
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Dwarves at the tunnel entrances on either side of White Wolf Mountain.

quests.name: Forgettable Tale...
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Veldaban, the Commander of the Black Guard in Keldagrim.

quests.name: The Forsaken Tower
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Lady Vulcana Lovakengj in the Lovakengj Assembly.

quests.name: The Fremennik Exiles
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Chieftain Brundt in the Fremennik Longhall.

quests.name: The Fremennik Isles
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking with Mord Gunnarys on Rllekka's northern docks.

quests.name: The Fremennik Trials
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Chieftain Brundt in the Fremennik Longhall, which is in the town of Rellekka to the north of Sinclair Mansion.

quests.name: Garden of Tranquility
quests.description: to start this quest I need to speak to Queen Ellamaria in the eastern garden of Varrock Palace.

quests.name: Gertrude's Cat
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Gertrude. She can be found to the west of Varrock.

quests.name: Getting Ahead
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Gordon at his Farm south of the Farming Guild.

quests.name: Ghosts Ahoy
quests.description: To start this quest I need to speak to Velorina, a ghost of Port Phasmatys.

quests.name: The Giant Dwarf
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to a boatman southwest in the Keldagrim mines. To get to the mines, I need to enter a cave east of Rellekka and north of the mountain camp, then straight into another cave.

quests.name: Goblin Diplomacy
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to General Wartface and General Bentnoze in Goblin Village, north of Falador.

quests.name: The Golem
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to the golem who is in the ruined city of Uzer, which is in the desert to the east of Shantay Pass.

quests.name: The Grand Tree
quests.description: I can start this quest at the Grand Tree in the Gnome Stronghold by speaking to King Narnode Shareen.

quests.name: The Great Brain Robbery
quests.description: I can begin this quest by talking to Brother Tranquility in Mos Le'Harmless.
quests: Recipe for Disaster - Freeing Pirate Pete

quests.name: Grim Tales
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Sylas in Taverley.

quests.name: The Hand in the Sand
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Bert in Yanille in the house near the Sandpit

quests.name: Haunted Mine
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Saradominist Zealot outside the mines of Morytania.

quests.name: Hazeel Cult
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Sir Ceril Carnillean at the house due West of Ardougne Zoo

quests.name: Heroes' Quest
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Achietties at the Heroes' Guild located North of Taverley

quests.name: Holy Grail
quests.description: I can only start this quest when I have completed the Merlin's Crystal Quest by speaking to King Arthur.

quests.name: Horror from the Deep
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Larrissa at the Lighthouse to the North of the Barbarian Outpost.

quests.name: Icthlarin's Little Helper
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to the Wanderer in her camp north of Sophanem.

quests.name: Imp Catcher
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Wizard Mizgog who is in the Wizards' Tower, south of Draynor Village.

quests.name: In Aid of the Myreque
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Veliaf Hurtz in the Myreque Hideout beneath The Hollows.

quests.name: In Search of the Myreque
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Vanstrom Klause in the Hair of the Dog Tavern in Canifis.

quests.name: Jungle Potion
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Trufitus Shakaya who lives in the main hut in Tai Bwo Wannai village on the island of Karamja.

quests.name: King's Ransom
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Gossip outside the Sinclair Mansion.

quests.name: A Kingdom Divided
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Martin Holt at the entrance to Kourend Castle in Kingstown.

quests.name: The Knight's Sword
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Squire in the courtyard of the White Knights' Castle in southern Falador.

quests.name: Land of the Goblins
quests.description: I can start thsi quest by talking to Grubfoot in the mines north of Dorgesh-Kaan.

quests.name: Legends' Quest
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Radimus Erkle in the Legends Guild, North East of Ardougne.

quests.name: Lost City
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Adventurers in the Swamp just south of Lumbridge.

quests.name: The Lost Tribe
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Sigmun in Lumbridge Castle.

quests.name: Lunar Diplomacy
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Lokar at the Docks to the west of Rellekka.

quests.name: Making Friends with My Arm
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Burntmeat in the kitchen of the Troll Stronghold

quests.name: Making History
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Jorral in the Outpost North West of West Ardougne

quests.name: Merlin's Crystal
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to King Arthur at Camelot Castle, just North West of Catherby

quests.name: Misthalin Mystery
quests.description: I can start the quest South-East of Lumbridge Swamp by speaking to Abigale or Hewey.

quests.name: Monk's Friend
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Brother Omad in the Monastery south of Ardougne.

quests.name: Monkey Madness I
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to King Narnode Shareen at the Grand Tree in the Gnome Stronghold.

quests.name: Monkey Madness II
quests.description: I can start this quest at the Grand Tree in the Gnome Stronghold by speaking to King Narnode Shareen.
quests: Recipe for Disaster - Freeing King Awowogei

quests.name: Mountain Daughter
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to the chieftain of the mountain camp east of Rellekka.

quests.name: Mourning's End Part I
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Iswyn and Eluned within the Isafdar forest.

quests.name: Mourning's End Part II
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Arianwyn in Lletya

quests.name: Murder Mystery
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to one of the Guards at the Sinclair Mansion, North of the Seer's Village

quests.name: My Arm's Big Adventure
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Burntmeat in the kitchen of the Troll Stronghold.
notes: Some Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup work required

quests.name: Nature Spirit
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Drezel in the Mausoleum beneath Paterdomus.

quests.name: A Night in the Theatre
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to the Mysterious Stranger outside Ver Sinhaza, south east of Meiyerditch.

quests.name: Olaf's Quest
quests.description: I can begin this quest by talking to Olaf Hradson who is north-east of Rellekka.

quests.name: One Small Favour
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Yanni Salika who owns the Antiques Shop in Shilo Village.

quests.name: Pirate's Treasure
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Redbeard Frank who is in Port Sarim, south of the Rusty Anchor.

quests.name: Plague City
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Edmond at his home, north of the Flying Horse Inn in East Ardougne

quests.name: A Porcine of Interest
quests.description: I can start this quest by reading the Notice Board in Dryanor Village.

quests.name: Priest in Peril
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to King Roald in Varrock Palace

quests.name: Prince Ali Rescue
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Hassan in the Al Kharid Palace.

quests.name: The Queen of Thieves
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Tomas Lawry outside the bank in Port Piscarilius.

quests.name: Rag and Bone Man I
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to the Odd Old Man to the West of the Limestone Mine.

quests.name: Rag and Bone Man II
quests.description: I can start this quest when I have completed Rag and Bone Man I.

quests.name: Ratcatchers
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Gertrude who lives on the west side of Varrock.

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle.

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster - Freeing the Mountain Dwarf
notes: Must be able to defeat a level 13 enemy

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster - Freeing the Goblin Generals
Recipe for Disaster - Freeing Pirate Pete
notes: Must be able to defeat five level 35 enemies

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster - Freeing the Lumbridge Guide
Recipe for Disaster - Freeing Evil Dave
Recipe for Disaster - Freeing Skrach Uglogwee
Recipe for Disaster - Freeing Sir Amik Varze
notes: Must be able to defeat a level 227 black dragon.
Must have started the Legends' Quest

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster - Freeing King Awowogei
notes: Must be able to defeat a level 84 enemy

quests.name: Recruitment Drive
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Sir Amik Varze, upstairs in Falador Castle,

quests.name: Regicide
quests.description: I can start thsi quest by talking to King Lathas in Ardougne Castle.

quests.name: The Restless Ghost
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Father Aereck in the church next to Lumbridge Castle.

quests.name: Romeo & Juliet
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Romeo in Varrock central square by the fountain.

quests.name: Roving Elves
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Islwyn and Eluned within the Isafdar forest.

quests.name: Royal Trouble
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Advisor Ghrim in Miscellania.

quests.name: Rum Deal
quests.description: I need to speak to Pirate Pete in Port Phasmatys.

quests.name: Rune Mysteries
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Duke Horacio, who can be found upstairs in Lumbridge Castle.

quests.name: Scorpion Catcher
quests.description: I can start this quest by speakin gto Thormac who is in the Sorcerer's Tower.

quests.name: Sea Slug
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Caroline who is East of Ardougne.

quests.name: Shades of Mort'ton
quests.description: I can start this quest by exploring the town of Mort'ton which is accessible form the southern edge of Mort Myre.

quests.name: Shadow of the Storm
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Fr. Reen in Al Kharid.

quests.name: Sheep Herder
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Councillor Halgrive north of Ardougne Zoo.

quests.name: Sheep Shearer
quests.description: I can start this quest by speakin gto Farmer Fred at his farm just a little way North West of Lumbridge

quests.name: Shield of Arrav
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Reldo in Varrock's Palace Library, or by speaking to Charlie the Tramp near the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.

quests.name: Shilo Village
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Mosol Rei deep in the unexplored jungles of Southern Karamja.

quests.name: Sins of the Father
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Veliaf Hurtz outside the church in Slepe.

quests.name: Sleeping Giants
quests.description: I can start this quest by investigating the Giants' Plateau east of Al Kharid.

quests.name: The Slug Menace
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Sir Tiffy Cashien in Falador Park

quests.name: Song of the Elves
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Edmond at his home, north of the Flying Horse Inn in East Ardougne.

quests.name: A Soul's Bane
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Launa at the Rift entrance north west of the dig site.

quests.name: Spirits of the Elid
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Awusah who is the mayor in the desert town of Nardah.

quests.name: Swan Song
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Herman Caranos at the entrance to the Piscatoris Fishing Colony, a long way north-west of the Gnome Stronghold.

quests.name: Tai Bwo Wannai Trio
quests.description: In Jungle Potion, Trufitus found Tai Bwo Wannai Village was Safe to inhabit. To start this quest I must deliver this news to Timfraku, Chief of the village.

quests.name: A Tail of Two Cats
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Unferth in his house in Burthorpe. Burthorpe is north of the Heroes' Guild in the Kingdom of Asgarnia.

quests.name: Tale of the Righteous
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Phileas Rimor in his home next to the Cloak and Stagger Inn in Shayzien.

quests.name: A Taste of Hope
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Garth outside Ver Sinhaza, south east of Meiyerditch.

quests.name: Tears of Guthix
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Juna the serpent who lives deep in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves.

quests.name: Temple of Ikov
quests.description: I can start this quest at the Flying Horse Inn in ARdougne by speaking to Lucien

quests.name: Temple of the Eye
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Wizasrd Persten north of Al Kharid

quests.name: Throne of Miscellania
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to King Vargas in Miscellania.

quests.name: The Tourist Trap
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Irena after I have gone through the Shantay Pass, South of Al Kharid.

quests.name: Tower of Life
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Effigy at the tower south-east of Ardougne

quests.name: Tree Gnome Village
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Bolren at the center of the Tree Gnome maze, West of Port Khazard

quests.name: Tribal Totem
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Kangai Mau in the Shrimp & Parrot restaurant in Brimhaven

quests.name: Troll Romance
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Ug who is in the Troll Stronghold

quests.name: Troll Stronghold
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Denulth in his tent at the Imperial Guard camp in Burthorpe

quests.name: Underground Pass
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to King Lathas in Ardougne Castle.

quests.name: Vampyre Slayer
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Morgan who is in Draynor Village.

quests.name: Wanted!
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Sir Tiffy Cashien in Falador Park.

quests.name: Watchtower
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the Watchtower Wizard on the top floor of Yanille's Watchtower.

quests.name: Waterfall Quest
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Almera in her home next to Baxtorian Falls.

quests.name: What Liest Below
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Rat Burgiss on the road south of Varrock

quests.name: Witch's House
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to the little boy standing by the long gartden just north of Taverley.

quests.name: Witch's Potion
quests.description: I can start this quest by speaking to Hetty in her house in Rimmington, West of Part Sarim

quests.name: X Marks the Spot
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Veos in the Sheared Ram Pub in Lumbridge

quests.name: Zogre Flesh Eaters
quests.description: I can start this quest by talking to Grish at the Ogrish ceremonial dance place called Jiggig.

quests.name: Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl
quests.description: Miniquest
